parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From dia and the base of prizo; to saw asunder, i.e. to exasperate.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To will, intend, desire, wish. Middle voice of a primary verb; to 'will, ' i.e. be willing.
From ana and haireomai; to take up, i.e. Adopt; by implication, to take away, i.e. Abolish, murder.
